definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to take a bath/to bathe/to immerse

sentences.english: Tim has had a shower already.
And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水電費甚至足以令最愛缸浴的人改爲淋浴。

sentences.english: Aveeno Soothing Baby Bath Treatment For soothing relief of dry, itchy, irritated skin. aveeno.
sentences.chinese: 安撫嬰兒浴治療安撫救濟幹，發癢，刺激皮膚。

sentences.english: It's great to go to the seaside and bathe yourself in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 去海邊享受一下陽光浴，好舒服哦。

sentences.english: Take a bath in powered milk about once a week to help improve your skin.
sentences.chinese: 每週一次的牛奶浴有助於改善你的肌膚。

sentences.english: He complained there weren't even any hot showers or flush toilets.
sentences.chinese: 他抱怨連熱水浴跟抽水馬桶都沒有。
木製的沙灘小屋及進行陽光浴的人們。

sentences.english: Shampoos , bubble baths and shower preparations with silk luster effect.
sentences.chinese: 用於具有絲光光澤效果的香波，泡沫浴和淋浴製品。

sentences.english: The as-spun fibers of PAA have been prepared by wet-spinning method under different coagulation conditions.
sentences.chinese: 爲聚酰胺酸溼法成形的凝固浴條件提供參考依據。

sentences.english: Mother baths the baby in warm water.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽正在爲嬰兒洗熱水浴。

sentences.english: Yellow Wamsutta bath rug pad and the outline " of " a new label.
sentences.chinese: 黃河沃姆斯塔輪廓浴地毯墊與新標籤。

sentences.english: Bath is the best choice for fall and winter milk bath or a rose moisturizing bath.
sentences.chinese: 秋冬泡澡最佳選擇是牛奶浴或者是玫瑰保溼浴。

sentences.english: Bath is the best choice for fall and winter milk bath or a rose moisturizing bath.
sentences.chinese: 秋冬泡澡最佳選擇是牛奶浴或者是玫瑰保溼浴。

sentences.english: And you don't need to stop being bathed in the breath when the hour is up.
sentences.chinese: 這一小時結束時，你沒有必要停止浴於氣中。

sentences.english: Manager: Oh! That is gas gouging and shot blasting area.
sentences.chinese: 經理院哦浴那是氣刨和拋丸區遙。

sentences.english: The built-in bath can be optimised with whirlpool systems from Villeroy & Boch.
sentences.chinese: 內置的優化浴可以從唯寶惠而浦系統。

definition: to take a bath/to bathe/to immerse
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
